person.persName: William D. Blythe (Ghent, Carroll County postmaster)

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer and grocer. Kentucky native. Married to Amanda Blythe. Father of William L. Blythe, James H. Blythe, Joel F. Blythe, Mary T. Blythe, and Elizabeth Blythe. Owned one enslaved person in Carroll County in 1850. Farmer in Carroll County in 1850. Grocer in Carroll County in 1860. Appointed Ghent postmaster on November 12, 1861.
